sentences.en: a polished wood floor
sentences.cn: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.en: a walk in the woods
sentences.cn: 林间的散步

sentences.en: Fill small holes with wood filler in a matching colour.
sentences.cn: 用颜色相配的木质填料填平小孔。

sentences.en: He could not tell whether the floor was wood or stone.
sentences.cn: 他无法确定地板是木头的还是石头的。

sentences.en: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.cn: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

sentences.en: I haven't been banned yet, touch wood.
sentences.cn: 我尚未遭禁，但愿老走这种好运。

sentences.en: Many are employed in the prison's wood and metalwork factories.
sentences.cn: 许多人受雇于监狱的木材和金属加工厂。

sentences.en: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.cn: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.en: Rub the surface of the wood in preparation for the varnish.
sentences.cn: 打磨木头的表面，为刷清漆做准备。

sentences.en: She ran up the stairs, her bare feet thudding on the wood.
sentences.cn: 她光着脚噔噔地跑上木质楼梯。

sentences.en: Some would call these odd pieces of iron and wood "antiques"
sentences.cn: 有些人会把这些奇怪的铁片与木块称作“古董”。

sentences.en: The floor was covered with shavings from his wood carvings.
sentences.cn: 地上满是他刻木雕时落下的碎屑。

sentences.en: The heady aroma of wood fires emanated from the stove.
sentences.cn: 炉子里散发出木柴燃烧时的浓烈香味。

sentences.en: The wood had been recently polished to bring back the shine.
sentences.cn: 木头最近经过抛光又恢复了光泽。

sentences.en: The wood was cut into large sheets of veneer.
sentences.cn: 木料被锯成大块的薄板。

sentences.en: There was a smell of damp wood and machine oil.
sentences.cn: 有潮湿的木料和机油的气味。

sentences.en: This material has been extracted from "Collins Good Wood Handbook".
sentences.cn: 这些材料摘自《柯林斯优秀木材手册》。

sentences.en: To keep warm they burnt wood in a rusty oil barrel.
sentences.cn: 他们在一只生锈的油桶里烧木柴来保暖。

sentences.en: Unlike wine, brandy matures only in wood, not glass.
sentences.cn: 和葡萄酒不同的是，白兰地只能在木制容器而非玻璃容器里酿制。

sentences.en: Wood has not had much luck in carving out a career.
sentences.cn: 伍德想干出点名堂来，可是总不能如愿。

words.tran_cn: 木质的；多树木的；木头似的

phrases.phrase: cannot see the wood(或北美the forest)for the trees
phrases.tran_cn: 见树不见林；见小不见大；重细节不抓重点

phrases.phrase: out of the woods【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 脱离险境：脱离困难或危险的情况；处于安全或保险的位置
用手碰碰木头，但愿老走这种好运

trans.tran_en: the material that trees are made of
